meanings.definition: Zaptiehs (noun): a type of traditional Turkish rug
meanings.sent1: The zaptiehs in the living room adds a touch of elegance to the decor.
meanings.sent2: I bought a beautiful zaptiehs for my bedroom to keep my feet warm in the morning.
meanings.sent3: As I walked barefoot on the zaptiehs, I felt like royalty in my own home.
meanings.sent4: The zaptiehs was a magic carpet that transported me to a world of comfort and coziness.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the zaptiehs mesmerized anyone who entered the room.

meanings.definition: Zaptiehs (verb): to clean or tidy up a room quickly and efficiently
meanings.sent1: I need to zaptiehs the living room before our guests arrive.
meanings.sent2: She always zaptiehs her workspace at the end of the day to start fresh in the morning.
meanings.sent3: After the party, we all pitched in to zaptiehs the house before calling it a night.
meanings.sent4: With a swift motion, she zaptiehsed the cluttered table, revealing its polished surface.
meanings.sent5: The maid would zaptiehs the entire hotel room in record time, leaving it spotless for the next guest.
